summary: This is a court-generated notice of electronic filing regarding a status conference in the case USA v. Epstein. It details the proceedings held on July 8, 2019, before Judge Richard M. Berman, including the presence of the defendant, his attorneys, and government representatives. It sets deadlines for bail submissions and schedules a bail hearing for July 15, 2019.

locations: U.S. District Court Southern District of New York
keyFacts: A status conference was held on July 8, 2019, in the criminal case USA v. Epstein before Judge Richard M. Berman.
Jeffrey Epstein was present at the conference with his attorneys Martin Weinberg, Reid Weingarten, and Marc Fernich.
The court set a schedule: defense bail submission due July 11, government reply due July 12, and a bail hearing scheduled for July 15, 2019.
Speedy trial time was excluded from July 8 to July 15, 2019, pursuant to 18 USC 3161(h)(7)(A) and (B).
The document is an automatic notice from the court's CM/ECF system, indicating it is part of the official case docket.
